page.title: 14CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: For older people there is a Sunshine club at Eagle and two senior citizen clubs at North Scarle.For adults there are two Bowling clubs,two football clubs,a cricket club,a tennis club,Womens Institute,a village produce association at Eagle and a wine appreciation society. The sports and social club at North Scarle offer facilities for bingo and have darts and pool teams in the Lincoln leagues.The Drama club rehearses at the club and then usually holds its performances there. The youth club at North Scarle is held in the chapel.The one at Eagle is held in the village hall. There is always lots to do in our villages.
